text: @realDonaldTrump @senatemajldr @marcorubio @SenatorCollins @SteveDaines @SenThomTillis @SenCoryGardner Dem Senators? UR not the POTUS! U only represent the GOP! This is why u'll lose reelection. UV lost: older voters w/your handling of Covid19; any chance at Black & Hispanic voters, educated women+Me2 Grps, Catholics+  other Christian Grps, All Generals+many military folk. UR DONE
